// <auto-generated />
#nullable enable

namespace Thinktecture.Tests;

[global::MessagePack.MessagePackFormatter(typeof(global::Thinktecture.Tests.ComplexValueObject<,,>.ValueObjectMessagePackFormatter))]
partial class ComplexValueObject<T1, T2, T3>
{
   /// <summary>
   /// MassagePack formatter for <c>ComplexValueObject&lt;T1, T2, T3&gt;</c>.
   /// </summary>
   public sealed class ValueObjectMessagePackFormatter : global::MessagePack.Formatters.IMessagePackFormatter<global::Thinktecture.Tests.ComplexValueObject<T1, T2, T3>?>
   {
      /// <inheritdoc />
      public global::Thinktecture.Tests.ComplexValueObject<T1, T2, T3>? Deserialize(ref global::MessagePack.MessagePackReader reader, global::MessagePack.MessagePackSerializerOptions options)
      {
         if (reader.TryReadNil())
            return default;

         options.Security.DepthStep(ref reader);

         var count = reader.ReadArrayHeader();
         global::MessagePack.IFormatterResolver resolver = options.Resolver;

         T1? @property = default;
         T2? @nullableProperty = default;
         T3 @structProperty = default;
         T3? @nullableStructProperty = default;

         try
         {
            for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
            {
               switch (i)
               {
                  case 0:
                  {
                     @property = global::MessagePack.FormatterResolverExtensions.GetFormatterWithVerify<T1>(resolver).Deserialize(ref reader, options)!;
                     break;
                  }
                  case 1:
                  {
                     @nullableProperty = global::MessagePack.FormatterResolverExtensions.GetFormatterWithVerify<T2?>(resolver).Deserialize(ref reader, options)!;
                     break;
                  }
                  case 2:
                  {
                     @structProperty = global::MessagePack.FormatterResolverExtensions.GetFormatterWithVerify<T3>(resolver).Deserialize(ref reader, options)!;
                     break;
                  }
                  case 3:
                  {
                     @nullableStructProperty = global::MessagePack.FormatterResolverExtensions.GetFormatterWithVerify<T3?>(resolver).Deserialize(ref reader, options)!;
                     break;
                  }
                  default:
                     reader.Skip();
                     break;
               }
            }

            var validationError = global::Thinktecture.Tests.ComplexValueObject<T1, T2, T3>.Validate(
                                       @property!,
                                       @nullableProperty!,
                                       @structProperty!,
                                       @nullableStructProperty!,
                                       out var obj);

            if (validationError is not null)
               throw new global::MessagePack.MessagePackSerializationException(validationError.ToString() ?? "Unable to deserialize \"ComplexValueObject<T1, T2, T3>\".");

            return obj;
         }
         finally
         {
           reader.Depth--;
         }
      }

      /// <inheritdoc />
      public void Serialize(ref global::MessagePack.MessagePackWriter writer, global::Thinktecture.Tests.ComplexValueObject<T1, T2, T3>? value, global::MessagePack.MessagePackSerializerOptions options)
      {
         if(value is null)
         {
            writer.WriteNil();
            return;
         }

         writer.WriteArrayHeader(4);

         var resolver = options.Resolver;
         global::MessagePack.FormatterResolverExtensions.GetFormatterWithVerify<T1>(resolver).Serialize(ref writer, value.Property, options);
         global::MessagePack.FormatterResolverExtensions.GetFormatterWithVerify<T2?>(resolver).Serialize(ref writer, value.NullableProperty, options);
         global::MessagePack.FormatterResolverExtensions.GetFormatterWithVerify<T3>(resolver).Serialize(ref writer, value.StructProperty, options);
         global::MessagePack.FormatterResolverExtensions.GetFormatterWithVerify<T3?>(resolver).Serialize(ref writer, value.NullableStructProperty, options);
      }
   }
}
